  • 9.0 Attribute table
  • Edit on GitHub

9.0 Attribute tableÂ¶

The attribute table contains all the layer attributes, displayed in popout window table. Layer attribute can be edited from this table. To access the attribute table navigate to:

Attribute table -> Open Attribute table...

Updates to attributes can then be assigned to layers using the Set button.
